Been trying to improve battery usage for months now, but haven't even bothered with 2 of the cameras due to the hassle of the first 2. Unless you have a lot of spare time - the wireless versions are a waste of money.

Review.Titre: I have tried my best with Swann
Review.Contenu: I have tried my best with Swann, so I decided to look them up on Trust Pilot...I have told them I will be posting my whole experience and their responses on the Internet Their Cutomer Services have lied consistently, and their Technicl Department?? Well customer Services advised me yesterday that they would be calling me either yesterday or today from the UK...They even gave me the telephone number tey would be calling me from as I requested that because we get many unknown/spam callers and have to be careful when you are elderly. So yesterday evening I received an email from the technical department from a chap named Paulo? from his mystery location at GMT+11 ?? Which the last time I looked was not Greenwich near London.... On which email were a ream of questions about my time zone and could I suggest two different days and two diiferent times that I may be able to take a call??   Now if he was based in the UK (Say at the UK Milton Keynes address which forwards your call to the Philippines) Then I would apologise for suggesting they lie... however no apology coming and looking at all of the comments and complaints I have seen today on this site. I think I need not bother them any more. I will just download the copies of my chats and conversations and if I cn prevent one person having to go trough the trouble I have had, then hopefully that will be someone receiving a Security Camera system from a reputable supplier this Christmas... And on an even more sour note, I have received multiple advert from them via email to visit their black Friday Sale at their website. think there was an error on that email and it should have read come and visit our "blacked out screen" site.You know it makes sense!!!   Really Dreadfull and if a Manager would like to call, then please use the contact details that were supplied to you on Order Number 5116334..that is if your computer will let you have them.

Cameras pick up motion, when they want to !Re-booted system three times, re-set to base settings and started again but still has a mind of its own.Watching recorded items takes an age and runs very slow, if at all.Should never have bought a wireless system.

Review.Titre: Poor product
Review.Contenu: Purchased the Swann WiFi product based on the wire free convenience but for a security solution it is useless.The motion detection hardly ever works.When it does, it captures too far after the event it is useless.When notified of motion the live view takes so long to start the subject has gone ! Useless.

Review.Titre: Does it worth to buy Swann Security system?
Review.Contenu: I have Swann Enforcer System DVR 4680 , used it for about 20 months, on motion detection, used to give push notification on mobile app. Recently I was forced to upgrade the app and since than this most important future,  does not work anymore. I have contacted Swann Communications and emailed the app developer but I had no reply.  Is this deliberately done,?

Review.Titre: Stil waiting for customer service LIZ…
Review.Contenu: Still waiting for customer service LIZ to call as promised   Tomorrow will be day 3 I am waiting for her to give me a camera/DVR compatibility ok.  I can’t move forward until I hear from her. I presently have a new DVR from Swann.com that is NOT COMPATIBLE. Dennis Sher9142246304

Review.Titre: Unreliable
Review.Contenu: Unreliable, self storage options just don’t work, so for a good security solution you will have to pay. Disappointed in what I thought would be a good self managed solution.

Review.Titre: the camera has a really slow load time…
Review.Contenu: the camera has a really slow load time adn constantly freezes. I still can't believe they dont make a 5ghz wireless camera. The 2.4 does not provide the proper bandwidth to stream 1080 without constant crashing. I have the gigabit package and my speeds are 950mbs but the camera still has a hard time loading as do the swann doorbell cameras, another purchase of wireless camera with poor antenna's. I would stay away until they make a reliable 5G wireless camera.

Review.Titre: Poor customer service
Review.Contenu: I have had several issues with Swann since I purchased the system. Each time customer service did not exist. The 7/16/23 date was my purchasing a new NHD-887MSFB Camera. This is camera #6 in my system. The original issue was moisture in the camera. The request was to send a photo of the camera noting the moisture. I never got a response back. Ultimately I tried to repair the camera but due to water damage I was forced to purchase a new replacement unit on 7/16.Your support services are lacking especially for equipment that is no longer under warranty.I like the system but hate dealing with your support services

Review.Titre: CAMERAS ARE VERY DELAYED
Review.Contenu: Even on 100% sensitivity they are delayed 10/15 seconds!! Someone entered our garden and we couldn't prove it because the camera didn't pick it up!!! Yet we knew from what they left behind!! We then checked and it didn't pick us up for 12 seconds before it recorded. So this is a waste of money if it doesnt pick up for so many seconds. We have actually only noticed this recently from having them a year so very grateful I have considering anything could have happened in the last year. Very disappointed considering the price we paid. DEFINITELY WOULD NEVER RECOMMEND

Review.Titre: Would not recommend at all
Review.Contenu: Would not recommend at all. As an electrician myself I am blown away at what a terrible system it is. I have had problem after problem since I installed my setup. But today takes the cake, I am currently away working and I have stopped receiving notifications to my phone about movement at my house. I called Swann to get this fixed and was told I have to be with the device to fix this so I have to be at home. I explained I am away and my house is empty right now so I need to be receiving notifications. Apparently there is nothing that can be done as you have to be at home to do any troubleshooting.

Review.Titre: For the application I give 5 STARS but FLOODLIGHT 1 STAR
Review.Contenu: For the application I give 5 stars but for the reliability of the Floodlight I give 1 star. Since 2019 This is the third Floodlight installed. The first under warranty suddenly stopped detecting wifi, Swann replaced it. In 2020 while waiting for replacement I bought and installed another one and in 2022 it also suddenly stopped detecting wifi so I've installed the third one since, hoping this one won't break like the other 2. Finally the app works perfectly now.

Review.Titre: Customer service are rude
Review.Contenu: Customer service are rude, hard to get a hold of, and lack suitable training to help their customers. They do not understand consumer law and are breaking it with what they are doing!

Review.Titre: Do not buy refurbished equipment from them
Review.Contenu: We purchased 2 refurbished outdoor cameras. One came with an invalid code so it could not be installed, the other had a bad lens so you cannot see the recordings.  I’ve tried twice to get customer service and have gotten no response from them yet.  Do not buy refurbished equipment from them!

Review.Titre: Do not buy!
Review.Contenu: I've had these cameras for over a year now. The cameras, themselves, work fine, with the exception of the settings and sensors not working very well. The biggest problem is the app. It's never worked right, and the updates only make it worse. When you're not home, the app not working properly, is a huge issue. The whole point of cameras is to be able to monitor your home when you're away. Due to the garbage app, I advise anyone to not purchase anything from this company.

Review.Titre: FAULTY CAMERA
Review.Contenu: If you can buy elsewhere do it don’t bother with this awful company I purchase a four camera set up and had it installed professionally.Three four weeks later a camera went off? I called the company and after two hours in the phone with there tek department still not working I then contacted swan who put mill through the mill again send prof of purchase I did that they they couldn’t read it sent it again they never came back to me until I contacted them?.Then they wanted a serial number and pictures of the wires?.Did that but the wires so high up I couldn’t get a good picture.Then they said send the camera back as there cameras don’t often fail?.Not happy they don’t want to know the warranty is a waste of time as they don’t honour it Disgusting behaviour from a major company you would expect a better customer service but you don’t get that I’ve now decided to buy a camera to replace there fault one and I wouldn’t ever buy from this awful company

Review.Titre: Replacement hard drive is NOT user…
Review.Contenu: Replacement hard drive is NOT user friendly and doesn’t work properly. No GMT for UK and record time not displayed on playback. Records randomly for no apparent reason. Chat assistant vague and no facility to address my problem.

Review.Titre: 14th July contacted Swann with all…
Review.Contenu: 14th July contacted Swann with all their requests met.Constantly chasing them until 3 days ago Earl requests information already given in singular e-mails. I think this is to stall as he has this information yet will then take a few days to message another request for information he has.........3 of my cameras have water ingress, yes supposed to be weather proof & I am still waiting for resolution

Review.Titre: Would not recommend Swann to anyone
Review.Contenu: Would not recommend Swann to anyone, had cameras and system working fine for 3 weeks, then the system went off line I reset it and it works for a few hours and it is goes offline again.For security the system is useless, for the robbers it is great.COMPLETE RUBBISH

Review.Titre: Good points delivery
Review.Contenu: Good pointsReceived the item in good time.Item packed and all parts there.Bad points.Realised I had purchased the wired set when I needed the wireless set, to send back I was going to be charged for the return of wich I accept but when they wanted £25 extra to replace the security tape on the box I changed my mind absolutely disgusting les than a yard of tape on the hole box

Review.Titre: Sent me the wrong cameras
Review.Contenu: Sent me the wrong cameras. Customer agent didn't believe me and wanted to charge me £25 for returns. Very Poor customer service that's if you can actually get through to them. NEVER will I use swann again.

Review.Titre: Password reset nightmare
Review.Contenu: In the old days I could call up Swann and get a password reset. Now it is impossible to get help. If you do manage to get through to a live person, they give you a link to a reset process, which does not work for me. I cannot get a password without having the system connected to the internet and I cannot set up the wireless connection without a password. I tried calling again and the voice system told me Swann cannot help me as my system is too old. So now I had to order a replacement DVR on EBay only because I lost the password. Not a good experience, lots of frustration and time & money wasted.

Review.Titre: Nothing but issues with cameras not…
Review.Contenu: Nothing but issues with cameras not capturing any motion and if by chance they do it has super lag time. So frustrating. Have had this system since November 2022 and it worked pretty good for almost a month. Haven’t used it in close to 3 months now and am giving it another try today. June 2023

Review.Titre: I received a reply from Swan.  Gave me number to call.  I called.  the automated reply system told me my equipment was no longer supported, and linked me to some websites for manuals. Did not work.
Review.Contenu: Purchased equipment. Hooked it up. Worked fine.  Went through the set wizard. Worked fine. 4 hours later, quit working. Went on line.  Checked my account. Looked good. Found nothing to change or fix. System not working. No one to call. Not planning now to continue business with Swann. I do not recommend for anyone else.

Review.Titre: Faulty cameras
Review.Contenu: Bought the Swann enforcer 8 channel 1080p dvr cctv kit with 4 cameras.After only 12 weeks two of the cameras stopped working properly. Even though they still recorded they were flashing continuously really fast and not displaying the right lights for night vision.I spoke to customer service and on their advice explained the issue and sent a video to the technical department who confirmed they were faulty.I was the informed to return the two cameras to see if they could be repaired and track the delivery.I have no problem sending the cameras back but was not in a position to have no security . I informed them of attempts on my property to take my dog and threats made .Unfortunately they would not send two working cameras to put up as this is not the policy.Considering they are only weeks old and the position I was in I was not satisfied with this.Now having to replace with a different systemWill never buy Swann again

Review.Titre: Still trying to get a reply about how…
Review.Contenu: Still trying to get a reply about how to return a purchase and very, very difficult to get an answer to a simple question.Unfortunately, email replies which were apparently sent have not come through to either my email or junk folder and i have checked many times.

Review.Titre: We have tried to install the cameras
Review.Contenu: We have tried to install the cameras, they initially worked and now are not working at all. We are receiving a message that there is ’no signal’ yet the box is connected properly and the Wi-Fi is working. We contacted the technical helpline and they have sent us a new plug! I don’t know if that is going to help as only just received it.

Review.Titre: not a great system unable to read a…
Review.Contenu: not a great system unable to read a number plate at 35 ft in daylight no wonder thief's get away no surprise eh.

Review.Titre: Took a long time to deliver
Review.Contenu: Took a long time to deliver.   The item is not working appropriately and does not appear to connect to my Swann security system.   Needs MUCH improvement or I want my money back.

Review.Titre: I like the swan cameras…but,
Review.Contenu: I like the swan cameras, however the app is very slow to load up. Also if one wants to view a specific area, let’s say 2 persons were detected, once you click to view the persons it takes you to the whole recording and not the specific area selected. The doorbell and inside camera at times disconnect themselves, as well as take long to load up. On reference to the main device it does not give one the option to go back to recordings.

Review.Titre: I bought the Swann 2 x core cam
Review.Contenu: I bought the 2 x core cam, managed to pair one camera but the other would not. I find the camera which works very slow to connect even though we have fibre. I decided I wanted to return the product and get the EUFY system I have at work which works far better. The customer care would not give me a returns process without speaking to technical. I didn’t want it replaced or repaired but they weren’t very cooperative.

Review.Titre: Overall the extension cable is top…
Review.Contenu: Overall the extension cable is top quality, however the union-connection is all i needed to extend the cable I already have. I feel that $30 something, was too much to pay for just the union- connection. Just a couple dollar piece of hardware is all I really needed.

Review.Titre: doorbell camera constantly drops…
Review.Contenu: My doorbell camera constantly drops out. Takes forever to load when there is a motion detection. By the time you finally get into the camera whoever was trying to break in would’ve got you by then…

Review.Titre: Swann cctv
Review.Contenu: HiI purchased a Swann security system after looking at many reviews, and after installing a six camera enforcer system I was instantly very impressed but after two months the cameras spotlight failed an I must say the customer service was appalling, avoid.follow up after swann replied 30-11-23i contacted swann helpline with my unique code on the app.i was then told to reset the system didn't work, then began thirty days of e-mails i was told to swop cameras on dvr rewire cameras to see if cables were faulty. The cameras were faulty but still they did not replace finally 27/11 they told me to return the system to screwfix as they would not help anymore, customer service is none existent AVOID

Review.Titre: Lately, I lost  video very often, hard to fix problem. Tec support on Swan not really good. Hopefully they will get better for better customers
Review.Contenu: Lately, I lost  video very often, hard to fix problem. Tec support on Swan not really good. Hopefully they will get better for better customers.

Review.Titre: Playback
Review.Contenu: Difficulty in seeing playback. Unsure about length of storage, time kept.

Review.Titre: Tried numerous times to contact…
Review.Contenu: Tried numerous times to contact customer service only to repeatedly got bounced around then the phone would automatically disconnect you. What I wanted from  SWAN customer service representative they told me to call another number for Customer Service to try to order part only again I found that you only can talk to technical support who tells you that they can’t handle any issues outside of technical support. The part I needed was the weatherproof connector to the cameras. Much to my surprise not one to represent or technical support knew what I was talking about. How sad!. I am so glad I bought it through Amazon and the customer service was right on re-ordered the parts. If I would’ve known, SWAN was such a complicated company , I would’ve never purchased the system the Company. DO NOT BUY IF YOU PLANNED NOT TO HAVE A PROBLEM.

Review.Titre: If you want decent quality email images choose your cameras carefully..
Review.Contenu: Replaced a Swann recorder which had failed plus its 4 x 5MB coax fed cameras with a Swann 4k system using power over ethernet with 4 x SWNHD-887MSFB cameras. Video and detection are fine but only see a tiny 8kb to 11 kb image on email. The images are blurred and I can't even recognise myself in them. The old cameras gave about 200kb decent images and were able to show me why the email alert was triggered. Raised with Swann support who eventually said its the cameras and that was the end of their interest. No information in camera specs regarding email image quality. Very disappointed with these cameras and lack of information regarding how and where images are generated. I had expected it to be within the recorder.

Review.Titre: System data is 2 slow
Nvr fine cameras find good picture
Review.Contenu: Nvr fine cameras find good picture. But the cable as in network cable for cameras to nvr .awful cheap and a nightmare to unravel. Which is a shame as the rest of the system is good. Also DHL offered a service point for delivery that don't take large parcels. Not swanns fault but as a customer shouldn't have to take over a week chasing and sorting redelivery out

Review.Titre: iv had swan cctv for years always been…
Review.Contenu: iv had swan cctv for years always been happy but this new set up is the pits just won,t take any email address what ever i do 5 days now still unusable  wish i left the old set up . really unhappy think your doing good upgrading  now not got any cctv taking care of my disabled  dad

Review.Titre: Swann tech incorrectly diagnosed the…
Review.Contenu: Swann tech incorrectly diagnosed the issue requiring me to purchase a DVR that was not needed. It was a new camera that was required. I found this out by doing my own trouble shooting. I am presently trying to return the DVR which is turning into a nightmare. Therefore I believe the Swann support severely lacking.

Review.Titre: Just basic instructions in pack
Review.Contenu: Just basic instructions in pack, ie initial setup, no idea how to access main menu or how to down load any content. Got it recording but unable to figure out how to access data. Not so hot for the novice

Review.Titre: Good cameras and clear pictures but the…
Review.Contenu: Good cameras and clear pictures but the app is shocking. The cameras are wired but still require Internet for the app to get notifications.  They disconnect continuously throughout the day and the app, well its a joke one minute you'll get numerous notifications the next it tells you no recordings on the day. I get a better service from my cheap WiFi cameras off amazon.

Review.Titre: Poor customer services
Review.Contenu: We got a faulty camera. I never see that as a problem, it is how the company deals with it that matters. They don't do refunds only exchanges which is unusual these days. There tech support was ok in sorting the fault (hence the extra star!), and agreed a replacement. The replacement that they sent was unboxed so was not an off the shelf new camera. I raised this with them and asked for an explanation. Despite emailing them three times over a three week period I did not get any response from them at all.

Review.Titre: I received my new unit
Review.Contenu: I received my new unit, hooked up everything and when I plugged in the power supply, no power. Tried several other outlets on surge protector, then tried a different wall outlet, still nothing. Looked around house for another power supply with same power specs and found one. Tried it and I had power. Notified you regarding the issue. Over a week later, no response, now it's been several days since the second request and instead of a response to my issue, I receive a Rate your experience. I would have given you a five if I would have received a reply and a power supply already. But still have a new unit I can't use. Your Customer Service needs work.

Review.Titre: Swann NVR setup and support
Review.Contenu: Pre-sales is only conducted via email once a 'chat case' is opened... the equipment is wifi capable, however the adapter is not sold in the UK... I managed to import one but it doesn't work over 5G... system works if hard wired to the router... also seems ok using ethernet to powerline adapter... the responsiveness of email answer can range from once a day to every 4 days... they have now offered to call me... the equipment seems to be decent. The UI on the HDD, HomeView (Windows) and iOS app are clunky, don't seem to synchronise / complement each other and requires trial and error and youtube videos to guide you... a very stressful time with very poor support... not what you would expect from a leading company... equipment fair, support and ease of set up lacking... also note that the equipment and cameras have a watermark... HiSilicon... this can be removed in the UI on the HDD... be prepared to have to work it all out yourself...

Review.Titre: When you by a kit and it said it's a…
Review.Contenu: When you by a kit and it said it's a 100 ft coaxial. And you need a adapter to put them together and I called you guys and I can a pack of them the blue ones then tell me to go to lowe's to see if I can get the other one (red one) and have a problem hooking it up to my android phone

Review.Titre: Not worth the money
Review.Contenu: 1 week of running 4X HD4k cameras. Quality on the monitor/phone is pretty poor for 4k.Cameras dont like sun hitting them at 90 degrees and puts them into a very dark mode.Night view is actually very good until you put the light on and then it is (s...) very poor. Motion detection is VERY hit and miss. From,in day mode, not picking up a full blown adult  to falsely recording a couple of  bushes moving. Night mode is set off by spiders,moths,owls and bats. Disappointed.

Review.Titre: Adjusting device settings seems to have a delayed effect
Review.Contenu: Device had issues at 1st being able to set up the motion detection mask.  Once I was able to set up the motion detection mask it still seemed like it was alerting in the areas i told it to ignore.  Once it finally did start functioning properly the device is repeatedly tripped by shadows that are moving on the ground within the vicinity of the camera. What claims to be a 6 Mon the battery ends up lasting about a week. Over 200 plus notifications from moving shadows in 2 days alone with motion set to close

Review.Titre: Unwanted viewers/users
Review.Contenu: Wish I could figure out how to remove the person or persons that have hacked my system and then I would love this system. The fact that anyone within 50 can search for a device and link up to it with a password is ridiculous. The safety of me, my wife, children, and animals are at risk daily. I have called and nothing has been done about it. My system is still being used by an unknown user within 50/80 ft radius. I have made serious considera to switch this year. It’s unfortunate because I own eight Swann cameras. I should feel safe and I don’t. Is there a resolution? I’m not sure other than switching providers.

Review.Titre: Had 2 Swann systems now and also…
Review.Contenu: Had 2 Swann systems now and also install them for customers. I would say the support is rubbish in the UK. Just encountered another issue today where they have updated the swannview app, Now it doesn't rotate on multiscreen mod, so now I have to tilt my head 🙃. Will not buy another or install it for others. Shame as they system can be very good.

Review.Titre: The camera had no video playback
Review.Contenu: The camera had no video playback. The other functions worked well. After multiple attempts to contact customer service by phone and a recorded message they would call back in 10 minutes, I never received a call. I sent an email to customer service and after two days they got back to me.Too late camera returned to Lowes for full credit.

Review.Titre: Poor battery life
Review.Contenu: I bought a Swann Xtreem wireless security camera to use in my back garden. The idea of going wireless was to make it easier and the Swann camera was attractive in that it had a long battery life. I wish I'd had a camera hardwired in now. Battery life is roughly 10 to 14 days even with hardly ant motion triggers and linking back onto wi-fi and the app after charging is a nightmare, sometimes taking an hour or two of faffing on. On the plus side, the picture quality is excellent even in the dark. Overall, pay for someone to hardwire a camera in for you, it'll be far less frustrating.

Review.Titre: Poor wifi reception…
Review.Contenu: Brought these security cameras to replace the cheaper non Swann ones that all bar 1 camera stopped working. What a mistake, should have just upgraded to newer version of the old 1s that i had. Old cameras were always getting 60-80% wifi and the wifi never dropped out, these Swann ones get 1- 20% at the max and are installed in excatly the same places but are constantly dropping out. I get great wifi around the house but these cameras just wont pick it up. Will not buy again or reccomended these cameras for the above reasons.

Review.Titre: One camera out of 4 has failed so asked…
Review.Contenu: One camera out of 4 has failed so asked advice on a replacement. Advised camera is not compatible with my NVR system, waste of money on bad advice. System appears not to be flexible. I have 5MP system, 4K camera doesn't talk to my current NVR system.

Review.Titre: No customer service. Don’t buy Swann
Review.Contenu: Purchased a replacement dvr online from swann. Was not compatible with my existing system because mine had bnc connectors and it had another style. Absolutely no way to talk to a human being about the return. none of the phone numbers on your site or on the papers that came with it could get through to a human being. When I figured out how to request a return online I had to have an active case number with tech support. Obviously this unit would not work. When I finally got through to tech support I had to argue/plead with the guy to give me a case number.  He kept telling me I was not talking to the right place. I kept asking how to talk to anyone else. He finally gave me a case number. So I finally could complete a request for a return.  Then I waited two days for the return authorization number. Finally sent it back and now waiting for the refund.   Will I buy Swann again? No

Review.Titre: Hello
Review.Contenu: Hello. I have bought the Swann security system and to be honest im dissapointent now. Had the old version of Swann cameras and they last for 8 years so i decide to upgrade for 4K resolution new set with build in lights and mic. After 3 weeks one of the camera lost the LED light, i report this to Swann and takes 2 weeks to get this replaced. 2 weeks later another camera lost LED lights as well. We see what Swann will have to say about that one now.

Review.Titre: I don’t have a problem with a company buuuttt…
Review.Contenu: I don’t have a problem with a company restricting their products to outside companies. As an owner I wouldn’t want to grant access to my devices outside of my network or products. However, when I upgraded my DVR from an 8 channel to a 16 channel, I had to buy new cameras that were compatible with my new Swann DVR. The cameras were the same BNC connection as the old ones but would not work on the new DVR. The Swann cameras should also allow you to edit the motion zones to cut down on some alerts. My cameras that are in front oversee some traffic driving by and send an alert to my phone. My front property is not far enough away to not see the street traffic. I have checked and there is no edit zone for motion activity.

Review.Titre: Well
Review.Contenu: Well, I read lot of review fromCustomer that have issue with  security camara. Respond from swann to Customer nice greeting thenWent Customer start writing What going With camara.Customer service well weWith recommend to talk toOur tech support.why Customer service answeringQuestion that their don't know about technology gadgets and not qualified To anwer question.put someone from the beginning Like tech support people whoWhat are their talking aboutFrom the beginning. A readLot of reviews and I wasn't toInpress. I even read thisReviews I Took a change Ibought a camara from swannAnd planning to buy moreCamara and box 16channel3t.b.hard drive. In near future.In my opinion some enployNeed to get re-train by a person  who is qualified techOn security systems and camara for tech support onCamara& computer.

Review.Titre: It would be nice to have a phone number…
Review.Contenu: It would be nice to have a phone number to talk to someone about a problem and if they could speak good English.Just got your reply, thank you.

Review.Titre: Disappointing
Review.Contenu: The product is disappointing and does not work as reliably as I would expect. Unfortunately having opened the outer box I have been refused a refund. I would not recommend this product and would not consider buying again from Swann.

Review.Titre: I purchased a refurbished unit from…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a refurbished unit from you.  It took me 4 phone calls and several days to get this unit disconnected from the previous owner.  I wasn’t able to connect to my phone until then.   Customer service was not helpful and kept promising to call back and did not.

Review.Titre: No replacements available.
Review.Contenu: Our original NVR box failed so I purchased another 8 channel device which I then found was incompatible with the existing cameras and there was no other machine available that would be compatible so I then had to buy 8 new cameras as well to use with the new NVR. In total this has cost the best part of £1500.00 for me to self install so no labour costs. After installing the new cameras which seemed to be working ok o the Saturday coming into the office on the Monday they had condensates behind the lens cover so were either fogged up or or as you are looking through mist. it is now Thursday and 4 of the eight still have not cleared. One still completely affected and not showing anything other than water droplets. Not too impressed so far.

Review.Titre: The application for the smart device…
Review.Contenu: The application for the smart device does not work correctly. In the playback screen there is a large portion at the top of the screen that is blacked out. Once you zoom in on an object it moves out of view and you are unable to move the screen back to see what it is you wanted to see. When using live view in high definition the app has a problem streaming in real time and most of the time there is a 4 to 6 second delay. I have updated my firmware on my Swann device and I have no problems streaming videos on my smart device.

Review.Titre: NVR8-8780 Poor service life
Review.Contenu: Had to buy a replacement NVR8-8780 camera system controller after original unit failed - original unit lasted only 2 years almost to the day. Camera’s have now also started to loose function.

Review.Titre: Good camera
Review.Contenu: Good camera, easy to setup, speaker no loud , siren & speaker, useless, , picture quality not bad, but you can’t read license plate number if they are just 5 feet  away from camera

Review.Titre: Instructions are not very clear how to…
Review.Contenu: Instructions are not very clear how to set this thing up.

Review.Titre: Does not seem to detect movement…
Review.Contenu: Does not seem to detect movement consistently. Camera is located in place by a magnet so could be removed easily

Review.Titre: Spotlights go off and on all night when…
Review.Contenu: Spotlights go off and on all night when weather is cold.   Seems like ice or water gets inside. Tried adjusting but still happens.  This is the second spotlight with camera that we have bought from swan.  We have another one around the house that works fine.

Review.Titre: Gutted has one of the two wires,I…
Review.Contenu: Gutted has one of the two wires,I ordered was snapped when I tuck it out the box I found it hard to contact someone regarding this so just give in

Review.Titre: Nothing but trouble since I purchased…
Review.Contenu: Nothing but trouble since I purchased these wireless cameras.The customer support cannot help me.I keep doing everything I’ve been asked. Re paired many times overI’m over it.Now I see that Swann wants to be paidThat says it all.Very disappointed and will not recommend them at all.

Review.Titre: Better playback of footage
Review.Contenu: My only problem with the app is that it is very inconsistent in saving playback footage. It skips way too much, even over a days worth of footage. Please find a way to improve this issue

Review.Titre: Poor support.Does not last.
Review.Contenu: Bought a CCTV system a few years ago, needed new cameras and now the hard drive has gone, spend a little more and get a better system.👍🏼Spend a good amount of money but still failed.😔

Review.Titre: INTCAM No Longer Supported and No Replacement.
Review.Contenu: I bought an INTCAM in October 21 and just been sent a message stating that camera will no longer work. It wont charge or connect to the Swann. They have offered a healthy 60% discount on a replacement but have limited me to what I can buy. Pushing me to the higher value models. I did pay very little for the camera last year but would expect it to last for longer than 12 months. No answer to emails as yet. Swann, you need to replace this for me please.Update to the rseponse from Swann. 05/01/23After your kind response, I contacte the tech team who cannot help and says to contact customer support. Those email seem to fly off into the ether and I do not get a response. If I provide my home address, could you please send a replacement as this is silly. 12 Months of use is not acceptable.

Review.Titre: I have to reset a few times a year 🫤
What happened to your customer service ?
Review.Contenu: I’ve been a 20 year swann customer, in the past 5 years, customer service has went to $&@/. I had 2 wireless cameras that for some reason swann decided to drop and totally disconnect and discontinued. My 2 were working fine until swann cut them out of their system.  Can’t remember exactly how long I had had them but less than 2 years and swann offered me 60% off for 1 replacement camera, again I had 2, so I’m supposed to get a discount to spend more money to replace. Next I broke my WiFi antenna and needed to replace it, I was told I could get 40% off other products, the antenna was $35 tax shipping all that bs, so I was going to get what $6 off. I personally think that my 2 cameras that were working were worth more than $6 ! So I didn’t bother using my discount code, but I did call and ask hey, since I spent couple hundred bucks on cameras that swann discounted, why could swann not just send me a new WiFi antenna and I would be just fine with that, “free of charge to me” $200 from me swann couldn’t try to make me happy by sending me a $35 antenna. Yeah you could say that NO IM STILL NOT HAPPY ABOUT IT !! I’ve set up my father’s house with swann, couple of friends houses, and 3 systems of my own over the years, but now I won’t be buying anything swann! When I decide to upgrade again which by the way is sometime this summer, it won’t have swann written on it anywhere. I don’t know what happened with swann but you used to have some damn great people there, now you’re a greedy company that could care less about your customers. Thank you for sending me this review form so I could let all of your colleagues know how I felt

You can use it without a subscription but the phone app is limited. Camera cables should include longer wires. 60 feet is not nearly enough this forced an additional 3rd party purchase as the Swann local retailers don't sell the extension wires.

I tried again today and after many minutes of waiting on the chat, I gave up.  Finally, I got an email from “John” of tech support who seemed nice but the email process is painfully slow and I will have to figure out the problem myself or seek another vendor.Second note:  I called a live person who was very helpful and updated my camera software (v. 6.4.3 vs. 6.1.7) remotely and that solved the problem. Review.Titre: 8 channel 4 camera NVR
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Swann 8 channel 4 camera, hard-wired NVR system to monitor my property. The cameras come with 60 ft. wires. Seems long until you add the distance down the wall (mine are 9ft.), and the slack (3ft.?) you need to the NVR. I needed 100 foot wire$ to reach my far corner$. My house is really not that big. I made it work. POE cameras are fantastic...software...not so much. Very cumbersome. I needed to cover some blind spots so I added a couple of hard-wired refurbs, and some Solar WiFi's. PC/TV is my preference for viewing, but you cannot see the Swann WiFi cameras on PC/TV...only on phone (Android/iPhone) app! I can now see 8 Swann cameras from my phone and only 6 Swann cameras on my PC/TV. Meanwhile my phone app times out on a security cam!!! "Unamused emoji". So, yes, I would still recommend this system, but be prepared to invest more than you originally anticipated to get the hard-wired solution you imagined.

Review.Titre: Swann Wifi cameras and doorbell
Review.Contenu: Bought two Swann indoor wifi cameras and a doorbell.  Overall quite mixed experience so far. Doorbell camera had initial set up issues and has a few flaws:  (1) lag between registering a ring and getting phone notification (2) video recording is too short and often cuts off part way through (3) sleep function renders device useless for a security device due to period between clip recordingsPan and tilt camera and auto tracking camera are good when they work but periodically disconnect from wifi.  Pan and tilt camera motion detection is a bit hit and miss.  Website point of sale also not clear that the device would not trigger through a window.No way to turn cameras off for privacy in the app or set scheduled on / off times.  Result is the need to manually switch them on or off and reconnect them in the app each time.App is slow to respond sometimes despite ultrafast broadband connection.Initial customer service contact via chat was ok but no contact recieved after case transferred for follow up.

Review.Titre: Super easy system and installation.
Review.Contenu: Although I bought this 2 years ago, I only installed it a year ago. The system has worked fine. The difficulty was the installation at my dormer bungalow with several lofts. Thankfully Swann supply extremely long cables so I was ableTo route everything to where I wanted it. You can also buy extension cables if you have more extreme lengths. After installing, it was a case of connecting the plugs into the cctv box, attaching a spare tv and the mouse and then working through the easy menu, followed by watching it all fire up. It’s now been a year of use without any problems. One of the front cameras covers a good 20 metres. The system connects to my smart phone so I can monitor whenever I want and review previous footage without needing a tv monitor.

Review.Titre: Good but not great

The ones I got were bent double.  (ANSI/TIA Generic Guidance - Minimum inside bend radius for copper)Had to get some new ones and have bought weatherproof.

Review.Titre: Swann NVW800 and Sensors
Review.Contenu: System works well so far however, sensors (door, windows, syren) don’t connect directly with NVW-800 but through home wi-fi. This is a serious security flaw of the system cause unnecessarily add sensors visibility in the network. Called Swann helpline and nothing can be done with the problem as the software prohibit connecting additional irems to the NVW.Today for the first time I opened the door without changi g the mode. Door sensor triggered the siren and… the siren is a mistake. A bit louder than the alarm that comes from the camera but behind the door it sound like a toy police car. And again, sensor didn’t trigger camera and camera didn’t notice the movement. I will keep observing how the system work…UPDATE: As of Nov 2023 the system works well. Other than above I’m quite pleased with it’s performance. I just love the app with Modes function and Live View. NVW-800 works silent and in comparison to Hiseeu I bought formerly It’s bearly hearable. Overall 5/6.

Review.Titre: From a novice security user
Review.Contenu: I'm new to the security scene. It used to be that crime wasn't even thought of, and when it occurred it was not fraught with violence.I like the picture resolution, and the ability to zoom in on a downloaded image. I wish it were real-time, and easier to view on my laptop. Only viewing on my phone, and only in portrait, limits what I can make out.  The sound took a long time to get where it was even intelligible, and maybe it can be more fine-tuned. I may play with that some more.It'll be interesting to see how it performs over the winter and through various weather types.

Review.Titre: A Novice review
Review.Contenu: This is my first security camera system.  The hardware installation was fairly straightforward.  The software setup was somewhat confusing and I had to read the instructions manual several times to get the desired settings.A mistake was made setting up the initial password and it was somewhat of a hassle resetting it, since the system is a standalone installation (I. e., no network, no Internet). I had to remove the DVR and temporarily install it on a network, so that it would have a MAC address assigned to it.  Once that was done, the password was reset and the DVR returned to the desired location.  I thought that was a bit much just to reset a password.  I guess the manufacturer assumed ALL systems are installed on a network; which was clearly not my situation.Anyway, I was able to get the system operating as designed.  I'm still trying to fine tune some of the settings.  This is taking a little longer then expected; but I'm attributing much of that to my limited understanding of how the system operates as a whole.I'm having to re-read some parts of manual to correctly apply the instructions, but I guess that's just part of the learning process.

Review.Titre: Knowledgeable Tech staff were able to…

After a few attempts, I discovered that the WiFi user name did not match. I called tech support and explained the issue, they assisted in troubleshooting and finally decided the camera had not been updated. They make it very hard to send anything back, requiring all sorts of documents. They finally sent an RMA to return it but no return ticket, guess they want me to pay for shipping to send back.

The new one kind of went back in time a little bit. For example the buttons on the screen are not colorful buttons, just outlines. Some of the features have changed as far as viewing them on the screen but the operation seems just as good as the old Swan.

Review.Titre: Almost a 5 star Review
Review.Contenu: The package I bought was a solid value for the money spent. It is simple enough to put up a basic configuration. Where I feel it falls short is with the quality of the ethernet cables, they are wound very tightly and I had issues with 2 of them not working after spending quite a while to unwrap them and allow them to soften and straighten You should pretest them before installing them in a permanent location. The audio is acceptable in listening mode only and records at a reasonable quality. Using the microphone is a different story and only results in a horrible screech coming from the camera. I tested this on multiple cameras as well as on a different model camera and the results were the same. I tried disabling the audio on all but 1 of the cameras and had the same results. The app for IOS and Android are basic and sufficient for viewing/reviewing events but making config changes is not a current capability, however it suits my needs. The management app for Mac/Apple doesn't work. I have not yet tried to install on a Windows based PC. The system comes with a lot of features that if needed will require a fair amount of time to configure and tune to dial in the system to reduce white noise alerts and excessive recording, but this would be true of any system with advanced features. The 6k quality is excellent, I would take their advice and add a second and or larger hard drive option if recording multiple cameras in HD if you don't want archive more frequently.
